title: DoorDash India Compensation
content:
Education - BE
YOE - 4.6
Date of Offer - 29th April 2024
Company: DoorDash
Title/Level: Software Engineer-II (L4)
Location: Pune, IN
Base - 22L
Stocks - 60L (vested over 4 years)
Relocation Bonus - 1.25 
Benefits - Standard Benefits
TC - 47.25L (Base + Stocks + Bonus)
Previous Comp -27LPA

What do you guys think? Should I accept?

title: Zomato | SDE-1 | Gurugram/Gurgaon | 1 YOE
content:
Education: BTech from IIT, Branch: EE
Years of Experience: 1
Prior Experience: 1 YOE in one of the big fintechs of India, Prev CTC: 16 LPA, 15 Base, 1 Retention Bonus
Date of the Offer: May 2024
Company: Zomato
Title/Level: SDE-1
Location: Gurugram/Gurgaon, Haryana
Salary: ₹ 24 LPA
Relocation: Reimbursements and flight tickets
Bonus: ₹ 6 LPA
Total comp (Salary + Bonus): ~ ₹ 30 LPA
